document_data.name: Szantel's Ropes, Cords, Chains, and Mesh
document_data.mainbody: '''Szantel's Ropes, Cords, Chains, and Mesh''' was a shop in the city of [[Arabel]] in [[Cormyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The store was located on the northern{{Arabel map orientation}} side of the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]] where it intersected the [[East Way]] and [[Calantar's Way]] in the center of the city. It sat directly west of [[Hawk's Perch Trading House]] and across the street from the shop of [[Dazniir Relharphin]], the wheelwright.
